title: CLIENT WONT CLOSE
body: Since 6.10 every game I play brings up another client icon in the dock (mac) these icons have no window and cannot be 'Force Quitted' Only one is the real game. They clog up the task bar and are a complete nuisance. They are building and building Ive got over 30 now.

replies.body: I've had problems with mine closing, but force quitting has always worked for me.  Maybe you should see an expert.
